attributes.action: increase prison sentence periods, decrease the length of bail periods and stop letting prisoners out early.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sentences are not long enough. 8 or 15 years is not life. And so many are let out earlier than their time. Prisoners have too many luxuries as it is. They are there to change so when they come out they don't re-offend.
There have also been cases where people on bail have committed crime again because their period before trial has been far too long.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
